channel.title: ~~ need help with a dupe method ~~
channel.description:
ok i have fixed alot of dupe methods but i heard a new 1 and its not patched on my server!
the dupe that i need help fixing is the dupe when 2 players are in wild and 1 is skulled and right when the skulled dies then u log and it dupes everything.
so im thinking the way to stop this is to make it so when a player dies and is under att and logs out they automatically die.
any 1 have any ideas or fixes for this?
